divs: Sighting DetailsDuring our transit from Hong Kong to Hawaii at the tail end of our 2011 deployment, I witnessed three basketball sized orbs appear one at a time and travel in the ship's wake. They decended down into the water on a path that I can only decribe as a roller coaster. Each orb took the exact same drop. They were about 20 second in between. With all the countermeasures that ship has I though that maybe I was just seeing something I didn't know the ship had.
Summary: Basketball sized orbs of light seen off the back of USS Ronald Reagan (CVN 76)
